title: Powers (2004) #12
description:
ANNIVERSARY SPECIAL EXTRAVAGANZA!!!!
Our fiftieth issue!! FIFTIEST!! (If, of course, we hadn’t started the renumbering in a very successful move to pander to a larger audience.)
But what will this special fiftieth issue entail? A lot. Because you asked for it! how about a short story written by Oeming and drawn by Bendis? How about two covers? One by Oeming and one by Bendis that when put together make one very cool image? How about double sized? How about an exclusive retrospective interview and a giant sized letter column and a couple of contractually obligated house ads?
All that and it’s a perfect jumping on point for new readers!
Homicide Detectives Christian Walker and Deena Pilgrim investigate murders specific to superhero cases. and with all superheroes declared illegal, the city is in chaos.
From the writer of some of your favorite marvel comics, (New Avengers, USM, Daredevil, Secret War) comes a brand new chapter from the award winning book!
48 PGS./Mature …$3.95
